title: Rads Error pls help !
body: Hi, I already tried few fixes from youtube but nothing worked , i changed DNS address at IPv4 , still nothing , so i found report on my problem and i think it might be helpful for you , hope some of you guys can help me so i don't need to reinstall the whole game , tnx in advance {{summoner:3}}

replies.body: This error can be due to permissions issue with your OS preventing the game from launching.  I suggest using our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot this.  I also recommend downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help automatically configure your firewall settings.  Hopefully, that gets you fixed up!
I just found the Solution for you, it worked for me, Restart your router and you will be fine, turn it off then on again
